<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Bibliography">Bibliography</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Kashmiri_language&amp;action=edit&amp;section=37" title="Edit section: Bibliography"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1054258005">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul li{list-style:none}@media(max-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{padding-left:1.6em;text-indent:-1.6em}}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns ul{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}</style><div class="refbegin" style="">
<ul><li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFChopra2013" class="citation book cs1">Chopra, R. M (2013). "Indo-Persian Literature in Kashmir". <i>The rise, growth, and decline of Indo-Persian literature</i> (2nd&#160;ed.). New Delhi: Iran Culture House. <a href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/909254259">909254259</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=Indo-Persian+Literature+in+Kashmir&amp;rft.btitle=The+rise%2C+growth%2C+and+decline+of+Indo-Persian+literature&amp;rft.place=New+Delhi&amp;rft.edition=2nd&amp;rft.pub=Iran+Culture+House&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F909254259&amp;rft.aulast=Chopra&amp;rft.aufirst=R.+M&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFGrierson1911" class="citation encyclopaedia cs1">Grierson, George Abraham (1911). <span class="cs1-ws-icon" title="s:1911 Encyclopædia Britannica/Indo-Aryan Languages"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/1911_Encyclop%C3%A6dia_Britannica/Indo-Aryan_Languages">"Indo-Aryan Languages"&#160;</a></span>. In <a href="/wiki/Hugh_Chisholm" title="Hugh Chisholm">Chisholm, Hugh</a> (ed.). <i><a href="/wiki/Encyclop%C3%A6dia_Britannica_Eleventh_Edition" title="Encyclopædia Britannica Eleventh Edition">Encyclopædia Britannica</a></i>. Vol.&#160;14 (11th&#160;ed.). Cambridge University Press. pp.&#160;487–490.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=Indo-Aryan+Languages&amp;rft.btitle=Encyclop%C3%A6dia+Britannica&amp;rft.pages=487-490&amp;rft.edition=11th&amp;rft.pub=Cambridge+University+Press&amp;rft.date=1911&amp;rft.aulast=Grierson&amp;rft.aufirst=George+Abraham&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFKoulWali2006" class="citation book cs1">Koul, Omkar N; Wali, Kashi (2006). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.koausa.org/iils/pdf/ModernKashmiriGrammar.pdf"><i>Modern Kashmiri Grammar</i></a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. Springfield: Dunwoody Press. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/1-931546-07-X" title="Special:BookSources/1-931546-07-X"><bdi>1-931546-07-X</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Modern+Kashmiri+Grammar&amp;rft.place=Springfield&amp;rft.pub=Dunwoody+Press&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft.isbn=1-931546-07-X&amp;rft.aulast=Koul&amp;rft.aufirst=Omkar+N&amp;rft.au=Wali%2C+Kashi&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.koausa.org%2Fiils%2Fpdf%2FModernKashmiriGrammar.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>

SPCK.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=A+Grammar+of+the+Kashmiri+Language&amp;rft.pub=SPCK&amp;rft.date=1888&amp;rft.aulast=Wade&amp;rft.aufirst=TR&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li></ul>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="External_links">External links</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Kashmiri_language&amp;action=edit&amp;section=38" title="Edit section: External links"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1134653256"><div class="side-box side-box-right plainlinks sistersitebox"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1126788409">
<div class="side-box-flex">
<div class="side-box-image"><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/80/Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg/40px-Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg.png" decoding="async" width="40" height="37" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/80/Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg/60px-Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/80/Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg/80px-Wikipedia-logo-v2.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="103" data-file-height="94" /></span></span></div>
<div class="side-box-text plainlist"><i><b><a href="https://ks.wikipedia.org/wiki/" class="extiw" title="ks:"> Kashmiri  edition</a></b></i> of <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia" title="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a>, the free encyclopedia</div></div>
</div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1134653256"><div class="side-box side-box-right plainlinks sistersitebox"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1126788409">
<div class="side-box-flex">
<div class="side-box-image"><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/30px-Commons-logo.svg.png" decoding="async" width="30" height="40" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/45px-Commons-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/59px-Commons-logo.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1024" data-file-height="1376" /></span></span></div>
<div class="side-box-text plainlist">Wikimedia Commons has media related to <span style="font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;"><a href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Kashmiri_language" class="extiw" title="commons:Category:Kashmiri language">Kashmiri language</a></span>.</div></div>
</div><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1134653256"><div class="side-box side-box-right plainlinks sistersitebox"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1126788409">
<div class="side-box-flex">
<div class="side-box-image"><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/40px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="40" height="40" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/60px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/80px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="193" data-file-height="193" /></span></span></div>
<div class="side-box-text plainlist">Wikivoyage has a phrasebook for <i><b><a href="https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Kashmiri_phrasebook#Q33552" class="extiw" title="wikivoyage:Kashmiri phrasebook">Kashmiri</a></b></i>.</div></div>

Jammu and Kashmir Academy of Art, Culture and Languages.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Kashir+Dikshanri&amp;rft.pub=Jammu+and+Kashmir+Academy+of+Art%2C+Culture+and+Languages&amp;rft.date=1968%2F1980&amp;rft.aulast=Toshakhani&amp;rft.aufirst=S.+K.&amp;rft.au=Hajni%2C+Mohiuddin&amp;rft.au=Pushp%2C+P.+N.&amp;rft.au=Beg+Arif%2C+Mirza+Ghulam+Hassan&amp;rft.au=Gowhar%2C+Ghulam+Nabi&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fdli.ernet.241983%2Fmode%2F2up&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFToshakhaniHajniPushpBeg_Arif1968–1980" class="citation book cs1">Toshakhani, S. K.; Hajni, Mohiuddin; Pushp, P. N.; Beg Arif, Mirza Ghulam Hassan; Gowhar, Ghulam Nabi (1968–1980). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/in.ernet.dli.2015.241984/mode/2up"><i>Kashir Dikshanri</i></a>. Vol.&#160;6. Jammu and Kashmir Academy of Art, Culture and Languages.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Kashir+Dikshanri&amp;rft.pub=Jammu+and+Kashmir+Academy+of+Art%2C+Culture+and+Languages&amp;rft.date=1968%2F1980&amp;rft.aulast=Toshakhani&amp;rft.aufirst=S.+K.&amp;rft.au=Hajni%2C+Mohiuddin&amp;rft.au=Pushp%2C+P.+N.&amp;rft.au=Beg+Arif%2C+Mirza+Ghulam+Hassan&amp;rft.au=Gowhar%2C+Ghulam+Nabi&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fin.ernet.dli.2015.241984%2Fmode%2F2up&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1133582631"><cite id="CITEREFToshakhaniHajniPushpBeg_Arif1968–1980" class="citation book cs1">Toshakhani, S. K.; Hajni, Mohiuddin; Pushp, P. N.; Beg Arif, Mirza Ghulam Hassan (1968–1980). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/in.ernet.dli.2015.510171/mode/2up"><i>Kashir Dikshanri</i></a>. Vol.&#160;7. Jammu and Kashmir Academy of Art, Culture and Languages.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Kashir+Dikshanri&amp;rft.pub=Jammu+and+Kashmir+Academy+of+Art%2C+Culture+and+Languages&amp;rft.date=1968%2F1980&amp;rft.aulast=Toshakhani&amp;rft.aufirst=S.+K.&amp;rft.au=Hajni%2C+Mohiuddin&amp;rft.au=Pushp%2C+P.+N.&amp;rft.au=Beg+Arif%2C+Mirza+Ghulam+Hassan&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fin.ernet.dli.2015.510171%2Fmode%2F2up&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AKashmiri+language" class="Z3988"></span></li>
<li><a href="//archive.org/details/newtestament-kashmiri/page/n11/mode/1up" class="extiw" title="iarchive:newtestament-kashmiri/page/n11/mode/1up">the word koshur(𑆑𑆳𑆯𑆶𑆫𑇀) written on New Testament in Kashmiri, (manuscript)</a></li></ul>

<ul><li><span class="noviewer" typeof="mw:File"><span title="Category"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/16px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png" decoding="async" width="16" height="16" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/23px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/31px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="180" data-file-height="185" /></span></span> <a href="/wiki/Category:Arabic_script" title="Category:Arabic script">Category</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
